messages.subject: NO MORE.  Stop.  Really.  Re: [AlwaysLearning] July 20-22, this list might not work so well
messages.msgSnippet: I was serious about not discussing an advance copy of Harry Potter. Do not discuss it.  Someone violated a written contract and could lose a job, and it s just
messages.messageBody:
I was serious about not discussing an advance copy of Harry Potter.

Do not discuss it. Someone violated a written contract and could
lose a job, and it's just not right, so no more discussion.

Sandra, rarely so serious

messages.messageBody:
Not a criminal, just super blessed :) No ordinary muggles 'round here! Some
kind of enchantment charm I've got ;)

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] July 20-22, this list might not work so well
messages.msgSnippet: -=-Need a pinch-hitter? I just finished the book :)-=- Well if so, you re an international criminal, and I don t know whether I should have criminals minding
messages.messageBody:
-=-Need a pinch-hitter? I just finished the book :)-=-

Well if so, you're an international criminal, and I don't know
whether I should have criminals minding the store here.
Don't tell how or if you finished that book. There's no statute of
limitations on murder, nor, I think, on letting HP books out early,
so you'd better just never mention it again.

I'll write on the side about whether you really want to moderate
Happy Land here...

Sandra

messages.subject: July 20-22, this list might not work so well
messages.msgSnippet: I m going to be occupied this afternoon and evening, out of the house, and am going to Denver for something Saturday night (which involves many hours of
messages.messageBody:
I'm going to be occupied this afternoon and evening, out of the
house, and am going to Denver for something Saturday night (which
involves many hours of driving).

Although I can check e-mail each late evening, there will undoubtedly
be messages that sit in the queue waiting for a moderator to say "okay."

I usually do that. There are another couple of moderators, but
here's the situation: The new Harry Potter book comes out this
weekend. I forgot that when I agreed to do this discussion in
Denver. My book will sit for at least 24 hours before I start to
read it. (Horrors... I'll be distracted.)

None of this lends itself to smooth and busy list activity. So
please be patient, if you send a post and it doesn't come to the list
right away.

Thanks!

Sandra
